item.title: Trump's DOGE stays on track after pair of federal judge rulings
item.description: A pair of federal judges, in two separate cases, filed rulings that allow DOGE to continue its track of finding government waste and slashing it.

item.title: Trump appoints Alice Marie Johnson 'pardon czar' during Black History Month event at White House
item.description: President Donald Trump on Thursday appointed Alice Marie Johnson "pardon czar."

item.title: Defense Secretary Hegseth working with DOGE to cut the 'BS'
item.description: Secretary of Defense Pete Hegseth released a video on social media explaining upcoming department changes.

item.title: Trump says this congressman would have his 'Total Endorsement' if he runs for Florida governor
item.description: President Donald Trump is making it very clear he would endorse Republican Rep. Byron Donalds if he runs in the 2026 race to succeed term-limited Flor...

item.title: Chainsaw-wielding Elon Musk makes ‘Dark MAGA’ appearance with Javier Milei at CPAC
item.description: Wearing a “Dark Gothic MAGA" hat Elon Musk made a surprise appearance at the Conservative Political Action Conference (CPAC) Thursday evening.
